definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: heifer;—abs. ´[[ע]] Ge 15:9 +; cstr. [[עֶגְלַת]] Is 7:21 +; sf. [[עֶגְלָתִי]] Ju Jdg 14:18; pl. cstr. [[עֶגְלוֹת]] Ho 10:5 (but v. infr.);—heifer, Is 7:21, used in ploughing Ju Jdg 14:18 (fig.), threshing Je 50:11 ([[דָשָׁא]] ´[[ע]], in sim., v. [[דּוּשׁ]], read perh. [[דָשָׁה]]), fig. of stateliness etc. Je 46:20; [[מְלֻמָּדָה]] ´[[ע]] Ho 10:11 a trained heifer (sim. of Ephr.); used for sacrif. 1Sa 16:2 ([[עֶגְלַת בָּקָר]]); cut in two for ratifying covenant Ge 15:9 (J; [[מְשֻׁלֶּשֶׁת]] ´[[ע]]; cf. [[עֵגֶל]] Je 34:18, Je 34:19); in cleansing city from blood-guiltiness De 21:3 ([[בָּקָר]] ´[[ע]]), v:De 21:4, v:De 21:4, v:De 21:6; once of calves worshipped in N. Isr. Ho 10:5 (where read prob. [[עֵגֶל]], so LXX We Now GASm, cf. Che, v. also the foll. sfs. ms.).
